Package lib.homies.framework.menu

Class AbstractPaginatedHomiesMenu

java.lang.Object
lib.homies.framework.menu.AbstractHomiesMenu
lib.homies.framework.menu.AbstractPaginatedHomiesMenu
All Implemented Interfaces:
HomiesMenu
public abstract class AbstractPaginatedHomiesMenu extends AbstractHomiesMenu
An abstract base class for implementing paginated menus. This class handles the core logic of managing pages, displaying items, and providing navigation buttons (next/previous page). Subclasses must define the specific items to paginate, the layout of pagination slots, and the appearance of navigation buttons.

  • Method Details

    • getPaginationSlots

      protected abstract int[] getPaginationSlots()
      Defines the specific inventory slots where the paginated items will be placed.
      Returns:
      An array of integer slots (0-based indices).

    • getNextPageButton

      protected abstract HomiesMenuItem getNextPageButton(HomiesPlayer player)
      Provides the HomiesMenuItem for navigating to the next page. This button should typically trigger nextPage() and then re-open the menu.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer viewing the menu.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenuItem for the next page button.

    • getPreviousPageButton

      protected abstract HomiesMenuItem getPreviousPageButton(HomiesPlayer player)
      Provides the HomiesMenuItem for navigating to the previous page. This button should typically trigger previousPage() and then re-open the menu.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer viewing the menu.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenuItem for the previous page button.

    • getFillerItem

      protected HomiesMenuItem getFillerItem()
      Provides a filler item for empty pagination slots on the current page.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenuItem to use as a filler, or null if no filler is desired.

    • getLoadingItem

      protected abstract HomiesMenuItem getLoadingItem()
      Provides a loading item to display in all pagination slots while content is being fetched asynchronously.
      Returns:
      The HomiesMenuItem to use as a loading indicator.

    • setPaginatedContentItems

      public void setPaginatedContentItems(List<HomiesMenuItem> items)
      Sets the list of all items that will be paginated in this menu. This method should be called after the items have been loaded.
      Parameters:
      items - The List of all HomiesMenuItems to be displayed across pages.

    • loadPaginatedContentItemsAsync

      public void loadPaginatedContentItemsAsync(HomiesPlayer player, Consumer<List<HomiesMenuItem>> itemLoader)
      Initiates asynchronous loading of paginated content items. While loading, the menu will display the loading item. Once the itemLoader completes, the menu will be refreshed for the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer for whom the menu is being loaded.
      itemLoader - A Consumer that, when executed, will provide the complete list of HomiesMenuItems. The consumer should call setPaginatedContentItems(List) with the loaded items.

    • getMaxPage

      protected int getMaxPage()
      Calculates the maximum number of pages required for the current items.
      Returns:
      The total number of pages (1-indexed).

    • nextPage

      public void nextPage()
      Moves the menu to the next page if available.

    • previousPage

      public void previousPage()
      Moves the menu to the previous page if available.

    • resetPage

      public void resetPage()
      Resets the current page to the first page (page 0).

      getItems in interface HomiesMenu
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      player - The HomiesPlayer viewing the menu.
      Returns:
      A map of slot to HomiesMenuItem for the current page.
